entries.message: Due to unforseen circumstnaces, this maintenance window is being rescheduled.

**Correction**
Previously deployed servers in Sydney will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Our engineering team will be performing upgrades to infrastructure in our Sydney location. During this maintenance window, the following functions will not be available:

• VPS instance consoles from the Vultr dashboard
• Bare Metal deployment and power control

Previously deployed servers in Seattle will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.

Our engineering team will be performing upgrades to infrastructure in our Seattle location. During this maintenance window, the following functions will not be available:

• VPS instance consoles from the Vultr dashboard
• Bare Metal deployment and power control

Previously deployed servers in Seattle will remain online without interruption and will not be impacted by this event.
